channel.title: Goblin Killer - Simple script and Proof of concept
channel.description:
I had just made a copy of that method which changes entity.x and entity.y into a Point you can click at, so I used it to make a goblin killer script. Ill be adding to it when I work out more stuff, like I'm fairly sure that picking up bones and stuff is something to do with that groundArray, when I finish a school project, Ill open a deob and see what I can do, theres no random event protection ether, so dont run it too long or with a good account.
you also need to replace update.log with the attached one, unless you have your own updated one. the EventShow script i just commited is very useful to see where the mouse is going, updated the sourceforge repos
Stand here [img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/7731/goblinkillerbh1.jpg[/img]
yes i have an account called Cherokee :|

item.title: Goblin Killer - Simple script and Proof of concept
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I am serious about the AccessorMethods. It seems you two are referring to the updater, I already have a parser to parse the output of ollie’s updater to the format used by cherokee, all I meant was make ollie’s updater output that file directly now and not generate a JageX.update since we don’t use it.

I know frank_, sL, and now that yakman are writing an updater, ollie’s is simply temporary until one of yours is finished.

Read full topic
item.source: Goblin Killer - Simple script and Proof of concept

item.title: Goblin Killer - Simple script and Proof of concept
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i also hope not, we dont need that one, we have our own,

like i have one, im sure frank_ and silver lining have one as well
ill just do some stuff with mine, then share
also, since ares is public, loads of people will use it and it would get broken easier

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Nice yakman, I think the next step is to take these AccessorMethods:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

And port them to cherokee. When I get time I will port the updater entirely for cherokee, it shouldn’t be too hard to do.
